1.

f(x)=2-4x হলে lim⁡h→0f(x+h)−f(x)h \lim_{h \to 0} \frac{f{\left ( x + h \right )} - f{\left ( x \right )}}{h} limh→0​hf(x+h)−f(x)​ এর মান কত হবে ?

BUET 11-12

f(x)=2−4x;lim⁡h→0f(x+h)−f(x)h=ddxf(x)∴ddxf(x)=2−4xlog⁡e2(−4)=−4×2−4xlog⁡e2 f(x)=2^{-4 x} ;\\ \lim _{h \rightarrow 0} \frac{f(x+h)-f(x)}{h}=\frac{d}{dx}f(x) \\ \therefore \frac{d}{d x} f(x)=2^{-4 x} \log _{e} 2(-4)=-4 \times 2^{-4 x} \log _{e} 2 f(x)=2−4x;limh→0​hf(x+h)−f(x)​=dxd​f(x)∴dxd​f(x)=2−4xloge​2(−4)=−4×2−4xloge​2

2. lim⁡x→∞3x2−sin⁡2xx2+5=?\lim_{x\to\infty}\frac{3x^2-\sin2x}{x^2+5}=?limx→∞​x2+53x2−sin2x​=?

BUET 21-22

আমরা জানি, −1≤−sin⁡2x≤1⇒3x2−1≤3x2−sin⁡2x≤3x2+1 -1 \leq-\sin 2 x \leq 1 \Rightarrow 3 x^{2}-1 \leq 3 x^{2}-\sin 2 x \leq 3 x^{2}+1 −1≤−sin2x≤1⇒3x2−1≤3x2−sin2x≤3x2+1

⇒3x2−1x2+5≤3x2−sin⁡2xx2+5≤3x2+1x2+5⇒lim⁡x→∞3x2−1x2+5≤lim⁡x→∞3x2−sin⁡2xx2+15≤lim⁡x→∞3x2+1x2+5……… \Rightarrow \frac{3 x^{2}-1}{x^{2}+5} \leq \frac{3 x^{2}-\sin 2 x}{x^{2}+5} \leq \frac{3 x^{2}+1}{x^{2}+5} \Rightarrow \lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{3 x^{2}-1}{x^{2}+5} \leq \lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{3 x^{2}-\sin 2 x}{x^{2}+15} \leq \lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{3 x^{2}+1}{x^{2}+5} \ldots \ldots \ldots ⇒x2+53x2−1​≤x2+53x2−sin2x​≤x2+53x2+1​⇒limx→∞​x2+53x2−1​≤limx→∞​x2+153x2−sin2x​≤limx→∞​x2+53x2+1​………

এখন, lim⁡x→∞3x2−1x2+5=lim⁡x→∞x2(3−1x2)x2(1+5x2)=3 \lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{3 x^{2}-1}{x^{2}+5}=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x^{2}\left(3-\frac{1}{x^{2}}\right)}{x^{2}\left(1+\frac{5}{x^{2}}\right)}=3 limx→∞​x2+53x2−1​=limx→∞​x2(1+x25​)x2(3−x21​)​=3; আবার, lim⁡x→∞3x2+1x2+5=lim⁡x→∞x2(3+1x2)x2(1+5x2)=3 \lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{3 x^{2}+1}{x^{2}+5}=\lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{x^{2}\left(3+\frac{1}{x^{2}}\right)}{x^{2}\left(1+\frac{5}{x^{2}}\right)}=3 limx→∞​x2+53x2+1​=limx→∞​x2(1+x25​)x2(3+x21​)​=3; তাহলে, (i) ⇒3≤lim⁡x→∞3x2−sin⁡2xx2+5≤3 \Rightarrow 3 \leq \lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{3 x^{2}-\sin 2 x}{x^{2}+5} \leq 3 ⇒3≤limx→∞​x2+53x2−sin2x​≤3

∴ \therefore ∴ স্যান্ডউইচ উপপাদ্য ব্যবহার করে পাই, lim⁡x→∞3x2−sin⁡2xx2+5=3 \lim _{x \rightarrow \infty} \frac{3 x^{2}-\sin 2 x}{x^{2}+5}=3 limx→∞​x2+53x2−sin2x​=3 (Ans.)

3. মান নির্ণয় কর:  Limx→∞2xsin(y2x)Lim_{x \rightarrow \infty } 2^x sin(\frac{y}{2^x})Limx→∞​2xsin(2xy​)

BUET 9-10

Lt⁡x→∞2xsin⁡y2x=Lt⁡2x→∞sin⁡y2xy2x⋅y=y(Lt⁡y2x→0sin⁡(y2x)(y2x))=(y×1)=y \underset{x \rightarrow \infty}{\operatorname{Lt}} 2^{x} \sin \frac{y}{2^{x}}=\underset{2^{x} \rightarrow \infty}{\operatorname{Lt}} \frac{\sin \frac{y}{2^{x}}}{\frac{y}{2^{x}}} \cdot y=y\left(\underset{\frac{y}{2^{x} \rightarrow 0}}{\operatorname{Lt}} \frac{\sin \left(\frac{y}{2^{x}}\right)}{\left(\frac{y}{2^{x}}\right)}\right)=(y \times 1)=y x→∞Lt​2xsin2xy​=2x→∞Lt​2xy​sin2xy​​⋅y=y(2x→0y​Lt​(2xy​)sin(2xy​)​)=(y×1)=y

4. lim⁡n→∞5n+1+7n+15n−7n \lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \frac{5^{n+1}+7^{n+1}}{5^{n}-7^{n}} limn→∞​5n−7n5n+1+7n+1​ এর মান হল-

RB 22,RUMC 24,BCPC 24,BUET 12-13

lim⁡n→∞5n+1+7n+15n−7n=lim⁡n→∞7n+1[(57)n+1+(77)n+1]7n+1∣(57)n⋅17−7n7n⋅17]=lim⁡n→∞[(57)n+1+1][(57)n⋅17−17]=0+10⋅17−17[∵∣r∣<1 \lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \frac{5^{n+1}+7^{n+1}}{5^{n}-7^{n}}=\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \frac{7^{n+1}\left[\left(\frac{5}{7}\right)^{n+1}+\left(\frac{7}{7}\right)^{n+1}\right]}{\left.7^{n+1} \mid\left(\frac{5}{7}\right)^{n} \cdot \frac{1}{7}-\frac{7^{n}}{7^{n}} \cdot \frac{1}{7}\right]}=\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty}\left[\frac{\left.\left(\frac{5}{7}\right)^{n+1}+1\right]}{\left[\left(\frac{5}{7}\right)^{n} \cdot \frac{1}{7}-\frac{1}{7}\right]}=\frac{0+1}{0 \cdot \frac{1}{7}-\frac{1}{7}}\left[\because|r|<1\right.\right. limn→∞​5n−7n5n+1+7n+1​=limn→∞​7n+1∣(75​)n⋅71​−7n7n​⋅71​]7n+1[(75​)n+1+(77​)n+1]​=limn→∞​[[(75​)n⋅71​−71​](75​)n+1+1]​=0⋅71​−71​0+1​[∵∣r∣<1 হলে, lim⁡n→∞rn=0]=−7 \left.\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} r^{n}=0\right]=-7 limn→∞​rn=0]=−7

5.   lim⁡x→0(1+7x)5x+3x \lim_{x → 0} \left ( 1 + 7 x \right )^{\frac{5 x + 3}{x}} limx→0​(1+7x)x5x+3​

এর মান নির্ণয় কর।

BUET 18-19

lim⁡x→0(1+7x)5x+3x=lim⁡x→0(1+7x)5⋅(1+7x)3x \lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+7 x)^{\frac{5 x+3}{x}}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+7 x)^{5} \cdot(1+7 x)^{\frac{3}{x}} limx→0​(1+7x)x5x+3​=limx→0​(1+7x)5⋅(1+7x)x3​

=lim⁡x→0(1+7x)17x×3×7=[lim⁡7x→0(1+7x)17x]21=e21 =\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}(1+7 x)^{\frac{1}{7 x} \times 3 \times 7}=\left[\lim _{7 x \rightarrow 0}(1+7 x)^{\frac{1}{7 x}}\right]^{21}=e^{21} =limx→0​(1+7x)7x1​×3×7=[lim7x→0​(1+7x)7x1​]21=e21

6.

lim⁡x→0tan⁡x−sin⁡xsin⁡3x\lim_{x \to 0} \frac{\tan{x} - \sin{x}}{\sin^{3}{x}}limx→0​sin3xtanx−sinx​   এর মান নির্ণয় করো।

BUET 19-20,RUET 15-16,JnU A 18-19

lim⁡x→0tan⁡x−sin⁡xsin⁡3x=lim⁡x→0tan⁡x−tan⁡x⋅cos⁡xsin⁡3x \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan x-\sin x}{\sin ^{3} x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan x-\tan x \cdot \cos x}{\sin ^{3} x} limx→0​sin3xtanx−sinx​=limx→0​sin3xtanx−tanx⋅cosx​

=lim⁡x→0tan⁡x(1−cos⁡x)sin⁡3x=lim⁡x→0tan⁡x⋅2sin⁡2x2sin⁡3x=lim⁡x→0(tan⁡xx)x⋅2(sin⁡x2x2)2x24(sin⁡xx)3⋅x3=lim⁡x→0(tan⁡xx)⋅2(sin⁡x2x2)2⋅14(sin⁡xx)3=1.2⋅1214(1)3=12 (Ans.)  \begin{array}{l} =\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan x(1-\cos x)}{\sin ^{3} x}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\tan x \cdot 2 \sin ^{2} \frac{x}{2}}{\sin ^{3} x} \\ =\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\left(\frac{\tan x}{x}\right) x \cdot 2\left(\frac{\sin \frac{x}{2}}{\frac{x}{2}}\right)^{2} \frac{x^{2}}{4}}{\left(\frac{\sin x}{x}\right)^{3} \cdot x^{3}}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\left(\frac{\tan x}{x}\right) \cdot 2\left(\frac{\sin \frac{x}{2}}{\frac{x}{2}}\right)^{2} \cdot \frac{1}{4}}{\left(\frac{\sin x}{x}\right)^{3}} \\ =\frac{1.2 \cdot 1^{2} \frac{1}{4}}{(1)^{3}}=\frac{1}{2} \text { (Ans.) } \end{array} =limx→0​sin3xtanx(1−cosx)​=limx→0​sin3xtanx⋅2sin22x​​=limx→0​(xsinx​)3⋅x3(xtanx​)x⋅2(2x​sin2x​​)24x2​​=limx→0​(xsinx​)3(xtanx​)⋅2(2x​sin2x​​)2⋅41​​=(1)31.2⋅1241​​=21​ (Ans.) ​

8.   lim⁡x→0ex2−cos⁡xx2 \lim_{x → 0} \frac{e^{x^{2}} - \cos{x}}{x^{2}} limx→0​x2ex2−cosx​ এর মান নির্ণয় কর।

BUET 17-18

=lim⁡x→0{ex2⋅2x2x+sin⁡x2x}=lim⁡x→0ex2+12lim⁡x→0sin⁡xx=e0+12⋅1[∵lim⁡x→0sin⁡xx=1]=1+12=32 (Ans.)  \begin{array}{l} =\lim _{x \rightarrow 0}\left\{e^{x^{2}} \cdot \frac{2 x}{2 x}+\frac{\sin x}{2 x}\right\}=\lim _{x \rightarrow 0} e^{x^{2}}+\frac{1}{2} \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x}{x}=e^{0}+\frac{1}{2} \cdot 1\left[\because \lim _{x \rightarrow 0} \frac{\sin x}{x}=1\right] \\ =1+\frac{1}{2}=\frac{3}{2} \text { (Ans.) } \end{array} =limx→0​{ex2⋅2x2x​+2xsinx​}=limx→0​ex2+21​limx→0​xsinx​=e0+21​⋅1[∵limx→0​xsinx​=1]=1+21​=23​ (Ans.) ​

(i) + (ii) ⇒y+1y=2[1+(log⁡ey)22!+(log⁡ey)44!+⋯⋯⋯∞] \Rightarrow y+\frac{1}{y}=2\left[1+\frac{\left(\log _{e} y\right)^{2}}{2 !}+\frac{\left(\log _{e} y\right)^{4}}{4 !}+\cdots \cdots \cdots \infty\right] ⇒y+y1​=2[1+2!(loge​y)2​+4!(loge​y)4​+⋯⋯⋯∞] (Proved).

13. যদি y = f(x) এবং x=1/z হয়, তবে দেখাও যে d2fdx2=z4d2ydz2+2z3dydz \frac{d^{2} f}{dx^{2}} = z^{4} \frac{d^{2} y}{dz^{2}} + 2 z^{3} \frac{dy}{dz} dx2d2f​=z4dz2d2y​+2z3dzdy​  



BUET 16-17

x=1z⇒1=−1z2⋅dzdx⇒dzdx=−z2 \mathrm{x}=\frac{1}{\mathrm{z}} \Rightarrow 1=-\frac{1}{\mathrm{z}^{2}} \cdot \frac{\mathrm{dz}}{\mathrm{dx}} \Rightarrow \frac{\mathrm{dz}}{\mathrm{dx}}=-\mathrm{z}^{2} x=z1​⇒1=−z21​⋅dxdz​⇒dxdz​=−z2 এখন, dfdx=dydz⋅dzdx \frac{d f}{d x}=\frac{d y}{d z} \cdot \frac{d z}{d x} dxdf​=dzdy​⋅dxdz​ [differentiale করে]

=dfdx=dydx=dydz⋅dzdx=−z2dydz∴d2fdx2=−z2ddx(dydz)−dydz⋅ddx(z2)=−z2d2ydz2⋅dzdx−2zdydz⋅dzdx∴d2fdx2=z4d2ydz2+2z3dydz (showed)  \begin{array}{l} =\frac{d f}{d x}=\frac{d y}{d x}=\frac{d y}{d z} \cdot \frac{d z}{d x}=-z^{2} \frac{d y}{d z} \therefore \frac{d^{2} f}{d x^{2}}=-z^{2} \frac{d}{d x}\left(\frac{d y}{d z}\right)-\frac{d y}{d z} \cdot \frac{d}{d x}\left(z^{2}\right)=-z^{2} \frac{d^{2} y}{d z^{2}} \cdot \frac{d z}{d x}-2 z \frac{d y}{d z} \cdot \frac{d z}{d x} \\ \therefore \frac{d^{2} f}{d x^{2}}=z^{4} \frac{d^{2} y}{d z^{2}}+2 z^{3} \frac{d y}{d z} \text { (showed) } \end{array} =dxdf​=dxdy​=dzdy​⋅dxdz​=−z2dzdy​∴dx2d2f​=−z2dxd​(dzdy​)−dzdy​⋅dxd​(z2)=−z2dz2d2y​⋅dxdz​−2zdzdy​⋅dxdz​∴dx2d2f​=z4dz2d2y​+2z3dzdy​ (showed) ​

14.

e3xsin2x এর nth derivative নির্ণয় কর।

BUET 1-2

সমাধান: y=e3xsin⁡2x=12e3x⋅2sin⁡2x=12e3x(1−cos⁡2x)=12e3x−12e3xcos⁡2x y=e^{3 x} \sin ^{2} x=\frac{1}{2} e^{3 x} \cdot 2 \sin ^{2} x=\frac{1}{2} e^{3 x}(1-\cos 2 x)=\frac{1}{2} e^{3 x}-\frac{1}{2} e^{3 x} \cos 2 x y=e3xsin2x=21​e3x⋅2sin2x=21​e3x(1−cos2x)=21​e3x−21​e3xcos2x

22. If y=12(sin⁡−1x)2y=\dfrac{1}{2}(\sin^{-1}x)^{2}y=21​(sin−1x)2, then find (1−x2)y2−xy1(1-x^{2})y_{2}-xy_{1}(1−x2)y2​−xy1​. ;

Where y1y_{1}y1​ and y2y_{2}y2​ denote first and second derivatives of yyy respectively.

BUP FST 19 20,BUET 13-14,KUET 13-14,RUET 07-08,IUT 10-11

Given y=12(sin−1x)2y=\dfrac{1}{2}(sin^{-1}x)^2y=21​(sin−1x)2.

We have to find (1−x2)y2−xy1(1-x^2)y_2-xy_1(1−x2)y2​−xy1​ where y1,y2y_1,y_2y1​,y2​ denote the first and second derivatives yyy respectively.

=12⋅ddx(sin−1x)2=\dfrac{1}{2} \cdot \dfrac{d}{dx}\left(sin^{-1} x\right)^2=21​⋅dxd​(sin−1x)2

=12⋅2sin−1x⋅11−x2=\dfrac{1}{2} \cdot 2 sin^{-1}x \cdot \dfrac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^2}}=21​⋅2sin−1x⋅1−x2​1​

=ddx(sin−1x1−x2)=\dfrac{d}{dx}\left( \dfrac{sin^{-1}x}{\sqrt{1-x^2}}\right)=dxd​(1−x2​sin−1x​)

=1−x2⋅ddx(sin−1x)−sin−1x⋅ddx(1−x2)(1−x2)2=\dfrac{\sqrt{1-x^2} \cdot \dfrac{d}{dx}(sin^{-1}x) - sin^{-1} x \cdot \dfrac{d}{dx} \left(\sqrt{1-x^2}\right)}{(\sqrt{1-x^2})^2}=(1−x2​)21−x2​⋅dxd​(sin−1x)−sin−1x⋅dxd​(1−x2​)​

=1−x2⋅11−x2−sin−1x⋅(−x1−x2)(1−x2)2=\dfrac{\sqrt{1-x^2} \cdot \dfrac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^2}} - sin^{-1} x \cdot \left(-\dfrac{x}{\sqrt{1-x^2}}\right)}{(\sqrt{1-x^2})^2}=(1−x2​)21−x2​⋅1−x2​1​−sin−1x⋅(−1−x2​x​)​

=1+xsin−1x1−x21−x2=\dfrac{1+\dfrac{x sin^{-1}x}{\sqrt{1-x^2}}}{1-x^2}=1−x21+1−x2​xsin−1x​​

∴y2=1−x2+xsin−1x(1−x2)(1−x2)\therefore y_2=\dfrac{\sqrt{1-x^2}+x sin^{-1}x}{(1-x^2)(\sqrt{1-x^2})}∴y2​=(1−x2)(1−x2​)1−x2​+xsin−1x​

Now we have to find

=1−x2+xsin−1x1−x2−xsin−1x1−x2=\dfrac{\sqrt{1-x^2}+xsin^{-1}x}{\sqrt{1-x^2}}- \dfrac{xsin^{-1}x}{\sqrt{1-x^2}}=1−x2​1−x2​+xsin−1x​−1−x2​xsin−1x​

=1+xsin−1x1−x2−xsin−1x1−x2=1+\dfrac{xsin^{-1}x}{\sqrt{1-x^2}}- \dfrac{xsin^{-1}x}{\sqrt{1-x^2}}=1+1−x2​xsin−1x​−1−x2​xsin−1x​

27. xa+yb=1 \frac{x}{a} + \frac{y}{b} = 1 ax​+by​=1 রেখার উপর মূলবিন্দু হতে অঙ্কিত লম্বের ঢাল tan⁡θ=? \tan \theta = ? tanθ=?

xa+yb=1⇒bx+ay=ab \frac{x}{a} + \frac{y}{b} = 1 \Rightarrow bx + ay = ab ax​+by​=1⇒bx+ay=ab

∴রেখার উপর মূলবিন্দু হতে অঙ্কিত লম্বের সমীকরণ \therefore \text{রেখার উপর মূলবিন্দু হতে অঙ্কিত লম্বের সমীকরণ} ∴রেখার উপর মূলবিন্দু হতে অঙ্কিত লম্বের সমীকরণ

ax−by=0⇒y=abx ax - by = 0 \Rightarrow y = \frac{a}{b} x ax−by=0⇒y=ba​x

∴m=tan⁡θ=ab \therefore m = \tan \theta = \frac{a}{b} ∴m=tanθ=ba​
